page.title: 04Superstitions and Beliefs
page.content: In Morton people believe that if you walk under a ladder on Friday the 13th it is unlucky.If you cross a knife and fork it is also unlucky.Some say that if you break a mirror it is unlucky.People say that if a black cat crosses your path it can be lucky or unlucky.Some say that if you spill salt it brings bad luck.If you put a sock on inside out and change it,it is unlucky.If you put an umbrella up in a house it is unlucky.People say that if you walk on some one else's shadow it is unlucky.Some say that if you go out on Friday the 13th it is unlucky.People say it brings bad luck to cross on the stairs.
